Notice of infringement of copyrighted work 
 1. The following works are copyrighted by VivThomas.com:
   a. A DVD called Six days with Vera Vol. 1" as for sale in our online store here:
https://secure.vivthomas.com/dvdsho/pproduct_info.php?products_id=54
   b. A second DVD called "A Weekend with Vera" as sold in our online store here: 
https://secure.vivthomas.com/dvdshop/product_info.php?products_id=104
 2. The following posts advertise illegal download links.
   a. The following post http://puckoach.blogspot.com/2006/08/six-days-with-vera-1-viv-thomas.html advertises illegal download links to the movie produced by VivThomas.com called 'Six days with Vera Vol. 1" (point 1a), as produced by VivThomas.corn and as sold by us in our online store. 
   b. Additionally the following post http://puckoach.blogspot.com/2006/08/weekend-with-vera-viv-thomas.html advertises illegal download links to the movie called "A Weekend with Vera" (point 1b) as produced by VivThomas.com and as sold by us in our online store. 
 3. Contact us: [priavte]@vivthomas.com
 4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
 5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 


Signed
